overview:
Al Campa is the CEO of Reachable, and has been a technology executive and entrepreneur for over 20 years with experience in building companies in business analytics, open source, talent management and enterprise software.

Prior to Reachable, Al was Chief Marketing Officer and Senior Vice President at Taleo. Before that Al was the Founder and CEO at Jaspersoft, which led the creation of the Open Source Business Intelligence market. Al was also Vice President of Marketing at Actuate, where he helped drive the company from a startup to a public company. And Al was an integral part of the management teams at Sybase, and at Sun Microsystems. Al started his career at IBM, and has an Engineering Degree from Stanford and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
